name: jotai-reloadable
description: this allows jotai/utils/loadable reloadable. you should install jotai to use this module.

scripts.test: pnpm run test1; pnpm run test2
scripts.clear1: cd $CURRPATH/sample; pnpm rm jotai-reloadable; pnpm i jotai-reloadable@file:..
scripts.clear2: cd $CURRPATH/sampleJotaiV1; pnpm rm jotai-reloadable; pnpm i jotai-reloadable@file:..
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist; tsc; CURRPATH=$(pwd) pnpm run clear1 ; CURRPATH=$(pwd) pnpm run clear2
